articles.title: Gabriel Jesus will not be bullied in the Premier League next season and wants Arsenal to be tougher - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'New season, same old story,' Jamie Carragher said during their defeat by Brentford in their 2021-22 campaign opener. A year on, Gabriel Jesus took all of 90 seconds to suggest he will help turn the dial.
articles.content:
It took less than 90 minutes for familiar accusations to resurface: Arsenal are soft. They can be bullied.
